author: larde.victor
title: (Close to) Free energy SPO by OST
description:
PoS is energy efficient, but is not zero energy.   
Setting-up a SPO is not for everyone, not affordable for those who want decentralization.
solution: One Small Town have access to new revolutionary technology, each town becoming free energy SPO, enlarging the network decentralization.
experience: Researcher - Scientist - Author - Activist - Humanitarian. Senior Financial Planner. Coach in blockchain & cryptocurrency. Business Planner.
